pullrequest.title: Don't shut down gazebo when removing a world -> gazebo7

content.raw:
Please let me know if I can give you more details about what's happening. 

Basically, when we were cleaning the state of the sensor manager (i.e. removing all sensors), the manager was still holding pointers to worlds. Since the sensor manager is a singleton and outlives worlds, it was preventing worlds from being properly destructed.
